# Yes Steve Model
### 一个修改原版玩家模型的 Minecraft Java 模组  
*A Minecraft Java mod that modifies the vanilla player model*

[在 Modrinth 上查看](https://modrinth.com/mod/yes-steve-model) | [报告 Bug](https://github.com/YesSteveModel/YSM-Wiki-Issues/issues) · [Wiki](https://ysm.cfpa.team/)

![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?labelColor=black&color=grey&label=&suffix=%20downloads&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/yes-steve-model&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/YesSteveModel/YSM-Wiki-Issues)
![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/316493876103872512?logo=discord)
![Crowdin](https://badges.crowdin.net/touhoulittlemaid116/localized.svg)

## ⚠️ 警告 Warning

请不要制作任何违反法律法规的模型，本制作组也反对任何形式的 R18 内容创作！也从未参与过任何相关内容创作！  
*Please do not create any models that violate laws and regulations. The production team is also opposed to any form of R18/NSFW content creation! We have never participated in any related content creation!*

---

1.2.0 及以上版本使用了 C++ 和 VMP。虽然我们已尽量使用数字签名避免，但部分杀毒软件仍可能误报。  
*Version 1.2.0+ uses C++ and VMP. Although we have used digital signatures to avoid this as much as possible, there may still be false positives from some antivirus software.*

  *TomatoPuddin: Programmer, participated in core design and Fabric migration*

### 贡献者 Contributors

还有许多美术协助设计模型或修正动画，因排序工作未完成，暂未一一列出。  
*There are also many artists who helped design models or correct animations. Since the sorting work has not been completed yet, they are not listed one by one.*

- `星屑海螺`：提供手臂动画、`Parcool`、`SWEM`、`Slash Blade` 等兼容动画  
  *Stardust Conch: Provides arm animations, Parcool, SWEM, and Slash Blade mod compatible animations*
- `甜粽子`：协助设计物理动画  
  *Sweet Zongzi: Helped design the physics animations*

## 常见问题 FAQ

### 1. 为什么本模组不开源且美术资源加密？  
*Why is this mod closed source and has encrypted art resources?*

美术资源被盗用和倒卖一直是严重问题，本模组最初就是为尽量避免这种情况而设计。  
*The theft and resale of art resources has always been a serious problem. This mod was originally designed to avoid this as much as possible.*

### 2. 为什么最新版不支持 Mac、Linux 或 ARM 架构？  
*Why does the latest version of this mod not support Mac and Linux, or ARM architecture platforms?*

最早版本为纯 Java 编写，可支持所有平台，但因安全性问题很快被破解。  
出于安全考虑，核心部分重写为 C++，而 C++ 跨平台开发相对繁琐。  
目前我们也在推进对其他平台的兼容，仍在进行中，有进展会及时更新，请理解。  
*The earliest version was written in pure Java and could support any platform, but it was quickly cracked due to security issues. For security reasons, the core part was rewritten in C++. Writing cross-platform code in C++ is relatively troublesome. However, we are currently also promoting compatibility with other platforms. It is still in progress. We will update in time when there is progress. But it takes time, so please understand.*
